name: Escape Reality (SolitudeGameStudios)
description:
After escaping an alien ship, you find yourself lost in an unfamiliar area. You must find out how to escape before you get caught.

Follow me on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/solitudegamestudios/

Follow me on Facebook at Solitude Game Studios

Be sure to download the correct file! There are downloads for both Windows and MacOS (coming soon)!
